title: Drawing, "Project for a silver sugar bowl and a silver salt cellar", ca. 1922
medium: Pencil, black crayon, white heightening, dark gray paper
description: Horizontal rectangle. On drop legs on disks. At left, the sugar bowl with a cover topped by a knob. At right, the salt bowl. The top is to be pierced, showing a plant. Framing line laterally and on top.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for a silver sugar bowl and a silver salt cellar", ca. 1922.Pencil, black crayon, white heightening, dark gray paper. 1939-84-21-a.
